name: part_007
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・夜公演】SorAZ Major Debut Live『First Gravity』【 #SorAZGravity 】【ホロライブ ⧸ ときのそら ⧸ AZKi 】 [7oFSKRxKu7A]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: A promotional montage featuring various songs and projects by SorAZ (Tokino Sora and AZKi), including album covers and MV clips.
Transition to the live concert stage with the audience holding lightsticks and instrumental music playing.

subtitles.original: 愛しさよ
subtitles.english: Oh, my dear

subtitles.original: 切なさは
subtitles.english: The sadness is

subtitles.original: 抱えたままで
subtitles.english: Still being held

subtitles.original: 辿り着く音 確かなメロディ
subtitles.english: The sound I reached, a certain melody

subtitles.original: これは生きた証だから
subtitles.english: Because this is proof of having lived

subtitles.original: 今も聞こえている
subtitles.english: I can still hear it now

subtitles.original: 聞こえてるよ
subtitles.english: I can hear it

subtitles.original: 二人だけの歌だよ
subtitles.english: It's a song just for the two of us

subtitles.original: 不意に 向こう側の気配
subtitles.english: Suddenly, a presence from the other side

subtitles.original: きっと目に映そう
subtitles.english: I'll surely reflect it in my eyes

subtitles.original: お待たせ ついてきて
subtitles.english: Sorry to keep you waiting, follow me

subtitles.original: 言葉積み重ねよう
subtitles.english: Let's pile up the words

subtitles.original: 高すぎる壁さえも 飛んでしまおう
subtitles.english: Let's fly over even walls that are too high

subtitles.original: 通り抜けたって 何も楽しくないって
subtitles.english: Passing through isn't fun at all

subtitles.original: ネバーイナフ 君が教えてくれていたんだ
subtitles.english: "Never enough," you were teaching me

subtitles.original: 腕をサンザン 駆け合わせ
subtitles.english: Intertwining our arms so many times

subtitles.original: 時々 相当 間違って
subtitles.english: Sometimes making quite a few mistakes

subtitles.original: それもラララ 気にせずに 何度でも挑もう
subtitles.english: Without worrying about those, la la la, let's try again and again

subtitles.original: だって I know myself
subtitles.english: Because I know myself

subtitles.original: 意味のない評価で 世界比べないで
subtitles.english: Don't compare the world with meaningless evaluations

subtitles.original: 叶えたい本音は 全てを包み込む太陽
subtitles.english: The true feelings I want to fulfill are like the sun that envelops everything

subtitles.original: いっそ 好き放題 上を目指して
subtitles.english: Might as well aim for the top as much as I want

subtitles.original: 立ちはだかる壁を登って
subtitles.english: Climbing up the wall that stands in the way

subtitles.original: 刻んでいきたいな そして次に望む
subtitles.english: I want to carve it in, and then hope for the next

subtitles.original: 越えたいあの未来
subtitles.english: That future I want to surpass

subtitles.original: 想像したら 鼓動が聞こえたんだ
subtitles.english: When I imagined it, I heard my heartbeat

subtitles.original: 作り込んだ道なんて 全部したがわずに
subtitles.english: Without following all the pre-made paths

subtitles.original: 響く音のまま 心が赴くまま
subtitles.english: Just as the sound resonates, just as the heart leads

subtitles.original: ずっと君なら 君なら 一緒に何でも
subtitles.english: If it's always you, if it's you, we can do anything together

subtitles.original: 築ける
subtitles.english: Build

subtitles.original: 躓いて 光が何も見えなくなっても
subtitles.english: Even if I stumble and can't see any light at all

subtitles.original: 振り向いたら笑える こんな場所がある
subtitles.english: If I look back, there's a place where I can smile

subtitles.original: 腕をサンザン 駆け合わせ
subtitles.english: Intertwining our arms so many times

subtitles.original: 時々 相当 間違って それもラララ
subtitles.english: Sometimes making quite a few mistakes, and that too, la la la

subtitles.original: 気にせずに 何度でも挑もう
subtitles.english: Without worrying, let's try again and again

subtitles.original: いつも be yourself
subtitles.english: Always be yourself

subtitles.original: ためらわないで ほら 何も始まらない
subtitles.english: Don't hesitate, see, nothing will start

subtitles.original: 些細な勇気で 明日を変えるまでも
subtitles.english: Until even a tiny bit of courage changes tomorrow

subtitles.original: 意味のない評価で 世界比べないで
subtitles.english: Don't compare the world with meaningless evaluations

subtitles.original: 叶えたい本音は 全てを包み込む太陽
subtitles.english: The true feelings I want to fulfill are like the sun that envelops everything

subtitles.original: いっそ 好き放題 上を目指して
subtitles.english: Might as well aim for the top as much as I want

subtitles.original: 立ちはだかる壁を登って
subtitles.english: Climbing up the wall that stands in the way

subtitles.original: 刻んでいきたいな そして次に望む
subtitles.english: I want to carve it in, and then hope for the next

subtitles.original: 越えたいあの未来
subtitles.english: That future I want to surpass

subtitles.original: 挑め このダイナミックな未来
subtitles.english: Challenge this dynamic future
